website_summaries.verdict: This rugged rubber model doesn't kick quite like a standard soccer ball, but they'll be having so much fun they won't notice the difference.
pros: Light shuts off after about 45 seconds of inactivity
Made of rubber instead of leather
Holds up well to use and abuse
cons: May arrive deflated, so be sure to have a pump available

customer_reviews.title: This WILL get people's attention
customer_reviews.text: Awesome soccer ball that truly lights up in the dark! It's bright and works out of the box, just need to inflate! Everyone oo'd and ahh'd at this, and this was not for a kid's party, but rather a college social! This thing can handle a beating, as proven by the rediculous kicks across field tonight. Excited to see how long this will last!
customer_reviews.author: rct3dt

customer_reviews.title: Kids Night Soccer Scrimmage Fun
customer_reviews.text: I use this ball for night scrimmage with my kids soccer teams - they love it. I also give them all glow necklaces ( so they can see each other better. For the goal I drape AA battery powered LED lights between the goal cones ( The kids often don't want our practice to end and beg me to let them play "just 5 more minutes" :-)
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Curtner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's birthday (11 years old). It broke after 5 days. Kids play, the battery pack (or whatever controls the light) falls out constantly. Don't waste your $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Busted after no more than two hours of use
customer_reviews.text: This ball was fun for the one outing we used it on, but was dead by the end of the evening. Our family of four took our dog (and the ball) on a evening walk, and passed the ball around as we went. (Our dog knows she can't have soccer balls, so she wasn't the issue.) The material just can't handle hard kicks and pavement. Appears to have gotten a tiny tear right on the surface. I didn't expect it to last more than a year, but definitely more than a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: A Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a great little ball
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great little ball. Now my kids can play outside when it's dark and have fun. The ball seems well made and the light is bright. I have two boys that play soccer so this ball has been kicked around a bit and seems to be holding up well. I showed a friend of mind and she said she was ordering one for her son as well. I would recommend it. It's a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kime

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Ball for young child
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 year old grandson and he LOVEs it. He likes to play outside and in the evening it makes it easier for everyone playing to see the ball. The ball is a normal size soccer ball that so far has held up great with all the abuse. Bought the light up basketball as a Christmas gift for our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: musicgenes

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for some die hard soccer fans. They received it quickly and took it out to play that night. They had a blast kicking it around In the dark. The lights lit up as expected and they've had no problems
customer_reviews.author: CottonwoodHouse

customer_reviews.title: My girls love to play soccer for fun and competition
customer_reviews.text: My girls love to play soccer for fun and competition. A lot of time they are out playing in the yard when it starts to get dark & they use to complain they couldn't see the ball very well. Now when it starts getting dark they switch to this Light-Up soccer ball to make it easier to see. Their only complaint now is that we need a light-up goal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: This ball came un-inflated. To be honest, I don't remember if it had a needle or if my husband used the one for his compressor. Once we realized that the batteries were in it, we went ahead and inflated it. Our grandson was delighted with it. He's been playing outside at night quite a bit now. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Great for night soccer
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks this is awesome. Very fun for playing around the yard in low light or at night. A cool ball for sure!
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: All the kids loved this! We live in the PNW
customer_reviews.text: All the kids loved this! We live in the PNW, where nights set in really early during the winter. The kids can still play in the yard with their friends after school with this ball. Only thing. We were bummed that the ball has bold cheap writing all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey’s in the Woods

customer_reviews.title: Looked too cheap to give as Christmas gifts, had ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked too cheap to give as Christmas gifts, had to return. Quality was definitely not up to par, especially for kids who play sports.
customer_reviews.author: Twinsymom

customer_reviews.title: Very cool idea. The baby plays with it more then ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool idea. The baby plays with it more then an one else in the house. We thought we where getting as soccer ball but its really like a basketball that looks like a soccer ball. If y'all can come up with one that is a soccer ball made right them we would get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Casey R Waldman

customer_reviews.title: My boys were excited to go out and play with ...
customer_reviews.text: My boys were excited to go out and play with the soccer ball, however within 10 mins the plugs holding the batteries in came out. Now the question is how do you reorder the plugs? Have contacted Kan Jam nothing on their website to shows or says how to reorder if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clarbour

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid
customer_reviews.text: This ball is solid. Kicks nothing like a 'standard' soccer ball. But standard soccer balls don't light up when kicked. Fun for around the yard and camp-outs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kieselbach

customer_reviews.title: Great for playing before daylight saving time starts
customer_reviews.text: Just a regular soccer ball that lights up! Great for playing before daylight saving time starts...
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Atwood

customer_reviews.title: the kids their love it too
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this soccer ball! She even takes it to school for recess.. the kids their love it too .. it looks pretty at night all lit up .. during the day you can still see it glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Moodle10

customer_reviews.title: Bright and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bright and perfect for an overnight game. Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: ACMC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome night ball - just a bit hard
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a night soccer game and the kids loved it. The only bad thing was the ball when properly inflated, is really hard. I know its probably my fault but during the game the plug for one of the leds came out and now its lost.
customer_reviews.author: ChevyMama77

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to kick with my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: During the winter months it is not always warm enough to go out but when it is we like to go kick the ball around. It is always after work and almost always dark. This lights up and stays on while you kick it around. We just do some light running and passing with it and is great for that
customer_reviews.author: cincyshopper1

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Just pumped this up today, my son hasn't seen or used it, because it is a Christmas gift. I assume he will love it, because we are always taking walks at night and he likes to take a soccer ball along and we end up looking for it in the field near our house, so this should be great for that.
customer_reviews.author: tricia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This ball is better then expected! Great real ball feel. Great light shinning. Standard size. Me and kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We thought the lights would go out on this after a bit of play. Nope, still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Hectic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it - we broke this out as a reward ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it - we broke this out as a reward for late soccer practices and the whole team looked forward to a scrimmaging in the dark every week.
customer_reviews.author: ToolUser

customer_reviews.title: The lighting is cool but this is a large (#5) ball and very ...
customer_reviews.text: The lighting is cool but this is a large (#5) ball and very very hard, meaning you really need soccer shoes to kick this.
customer_reviews.author: DTJ

customer_reviews.title: Light up soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball lights up big and bright when you kick it. There will be many outdoor soccer games at night in the back yard with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jack McKosky

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Soccer team loved to use this. Not sure having them use at night good as they could not see each other but a few glow sticks solved that issue
customer_reviews.author: T-

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the ball. At first I was worried that the LED light would be to bright and it was just right. It was as if it was a bright glow in the dark. Gave it as a gift and she was very happy. Played well into the night with it right off. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Cool Idea - my son loves playing with this - ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool Idea - my son loves playing with this - it really illuminates well at night. Only down side is length of battery time.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Flick

customer_reviews.title: We opened and examined and it looks good. We don't have the proper pump to blow ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmast gift not yet given. We opened and examined and it looks good. We don't have the proper pump to blow it up so that will be in the hands of the recipient. fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: calaughingdog

customer_reviews.title: The neighbors all want one now! PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit of the entire Christmas / night time / neighborhood everything! Everyone wants one! Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Redenti

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son last year. He recently lost one of the plugs that holds the light in place and KanJam is providing a replacement. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. She already has the basketball and loves it as the family sometimes plays outside at night.
customer_reviews.author: L. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Some friends and I have Friday night games in my backyard and this thing makes the games that much more awesome. Incredibly easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bomb! Some friends and I have Friday night games in my backyard and this thing makes the games that much more awesome. Incredibly easy to see, feels like a normal soccer ball
customer_reviews.author: Trent Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light up ball
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball... My son loves it! A kick turns it on and it goes off automatically in a certain amount of time.. Color looks awesome at night
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun. Turns heads. Everyone wants to play. Even grandma.
customer_reviews.author: solange

customer_reviews.title: So sweet. I need it back!
customer_reviews.text: So sad my dorm mate sent this one flying onto a roof at night and I was super excited to bring it to my friends ranch that weekend. Everyone should have one of these because they are so fun and special and you will want to take care of it and go outside at night to different places..
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew. He loved it! It worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Justtlm

customer_reviews.title: ... played with this ball the first time tonight and loved it. VERY bright and easy to see
customer_reviews.text: My boys played with this ball the first time tonight and loved it. VERY bright and easy to see. A little heavy, but worth every penny to get some energy out when the days are short.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: We can play all night
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and son in law played way after dark Father /son time The best. They both love the lighted soccer ball
customer_reviews.author: KATHALEEN MCGHEE

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for a Soccer Player
customer_reviews.text: Awesome soccer ball, granddaughter loves that she can play in the dark with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Ball is nice for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Ball is nice for what it is, but the 1st time we used it one of the plugs over the battery came out while playing. I have to try and find a way to make or get a new plug or we'll loose one of the lights.
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries fell out in 20 mins!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed with the quality. I got this for my boys so they could have fun playing after it got dark. Within 20 mins the batteries fell out. The only reason it's getting 3 stars is that it holds air pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Dreher

customer_reviews.title: Beach ready
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, loved it for our beach party. Make sure you get plug back in battery pack
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun. Very easy to see. Much better than the balls with GID paint. Girls soccer team loves playing after dark!
customer_reviews.author: Brian James

customer_reviews.title: Received on time! Just as described. Can't wait ...
customer_reviews.text: Received on time! Just as described. Can't wait to give to my 15 year old son for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Renee H.

customer_reviews.title: fun ball
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons loved it. Its lirs if fun and lights up every time you keep ck it and every time it bounces ....
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this but once we got the batteries installed it works really well. The ball seems well made and that it should last for a long time. Still using the same batteries after several hours of play time. The kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: NW Mom

customer_reviews.title: great fun gift and it works!!
customer_reviews.text: great lites up and looks just fabulous -nice gift for granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: barbara from brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: So Cool pictures dont do it justice.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool and lights up better than I ever would of thought. Me and my Son have really enjoyed playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: danny santone

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it Shows in picture back but I received a ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it Shows in picture back but I received a white ball. Disappointed in that
customer_reviews.author: Pamnoles

customer_reviews.title: HIghly visibile and a lot of fun for my U-14 boys team.
customer_reviews.text: Used this ball with my U-14 Boys team. It worked GREAT! Is the only ball of three different glow in the dark balls that was well lit and that you could see from across the field. The boys gave it a thorough workout for about an hour and it is still in great shape for my girls team. Only time will tell how it wears but so far so good. It is NOT a regular soccer ball. It is rubber and has batteries, thus a little heavier. It is pretty close though and the guys were able to launch it pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Crownan

customer_reviews.title: She loved it.
customer_reviews.text: given to my daughter as a gift. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: Great when working
customer_reviews.text: Great when working, stopped after 1 hour not sure why
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This ball is amazing!! we take it camping and its out ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is amazing!! we take it camping and its out every night. kids from 3-40 play with this ball. its a little lighter then a soccer ball. it even bounces well.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: works great even though it feels more like a heavy jumbo bouncy ball than a soccer ball. great fun a night!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Fryhover

customer_reviews.title: Fun soccer ball!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! As stated, it is not a regulation ball, and seems harder than normal, so kids should not try and head it. But it lights up and is fun to play with at night for the team.
customer_reviews.author: j.snyd

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift and the teenager who got it was very happy! The lights are nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Numbers Lady

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift. My daughter-in-law inflated it and tried it out. It seems to work really well. She can't wait to put it to the test with her youth soccer team.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to grandson. He loves it. Can play at night in back yard and not lose the ball.
customer_reviews.author: rrusa

customer_reviews.title: Still good. Not the same material as most modern soccer ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a few weeks now. Still good. Not the same material as most modern soccer balls but the rubber is not bad at all. Still feels great.
customer_reviews.author: William De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Would have preferred a size 4 but he and his 5 and 6 year old friends loved it anyway
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 6 year old as birthday gift. Would have preferred a size 4 but he and his 5 and 6 year old friends loved it anyway. Expedited shipping was used to insure on-time arrival and it was here in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: J Walter B

customer_reviews.title: Kid's love it
customer_reviews.text: This soccer ball is great fun at night and during the day. Playing in the dark add's a cool element to the game.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Krohn

customer_reviews.title: loved it so much fun at night and really
customer_reviews.text: loved it so much fun at night and really bright
customer_reviews.author: raven fremgen ♍👄💕 and kacie fremgen♌ 🌼💋

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It does glow in the dark and it is easy to use. I would recommend this to any soccer player
customer_reviews.author: Dana M Brakhane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for autumn practices
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for autumn practices; the kids ran around for an extra half hour after practice stealing the balls from each other.
customer_reviews.author: M. Attaway

customer_reviews.title: pefect perfect perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this product. Purchased one for my daughter and one for my niece. They both loved it! It's great that the light is motion sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It did not even last a day. The battery was dead after only a few moments. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Suni Furlong

customer_reviews.title: fun!!
customer_reviews.text: it does just what it says. my son will have practice at night and the field is pitch black and the ball is very bright. the kids love it. it is a size 5 and a rubberish type material, so too big for our regular soccer game( we need #4 ball), but it is COOL!! I'd add a pic, but can't find the place to.
customer_reviews.author: ASZ

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: It meets the soccer guidelines and is easy to see during those evening practices
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: I coach a u8 soccer team and when day light savings time hit the kids loved it. No problems shipping was quick also. Great idea to have a kick switch to save the batteries and lights.
customer_reviews.author: greg223

customer_reviews.title: You will receive this waded up and deflated...
customer_reviews.text: I hate it when you receive a product like this ball only to find it comes waded up flat and deflated. You could, at least, say somewhere in the box or in the description of the product that the person receiving this ball will have to go out and buy something to inflate the ball. There was nothing anywhere to indicate this would not come inflated and ready to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo High

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, we are amazed 100% recommended, my whole family enjoys it at night. It is the best purchase to enjoy with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Eliecer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really a true soccer ball, but a novelty item that is interesting.
customer_reviews.author: R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Item !!
customer_reviews.text: This item along with the Glow Football arrived together in a timely manner. They were exactly what I was expecting and are a very awesome gift. My 14yr old just loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best light up soccer ball ever!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this light up soccer ball several months ago and it still works. We store it inside instead of outside in the cold. I purchased it for a neon/glow in the dark outdoor party and it was the most poplar event during the party. Kids couldn't stop playing soccer in the dark. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Meshanko

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Practices often go past dusk. This ball enabled play in the dark. All the kids loved it. Great for any soccer team.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson was very happy with this and he loves it dearly!!
customer_reviews.author: jana lee marden

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: This soccer ball glows perfectly for a night game with the kids (11 and 14). My only complaint is the instructions included in the package didn't explain the ball would light up while in play, then shut off automatically after it has been at rest for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Players love it
customer_reviews.text: The length of my last practice light is effected by the amount of clouds. I bought this and my middle school players love it. I have a hard time getting them to stop playing. The full moon night in October gave us a extra half an hour with the LED ball. It is made of rubber with the batteries safely enclosed. It really glows bright and I have used it for three weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Pat L.

customer_reviews.title: Super nice ball
customer_reviews.text: Super nice ball. It already comes with batteries in the NFL so so you have to do is pump it up with a regular soccer pump and you're ready to play. It is definitely very bright during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It comes deflated and with minimal instructions on how to turn the lights on.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Berumen

customer_reviews.title: This ball looks so cool... can,t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this ball for one of my grandchildren,so I hope it lasts a long time. I hope it continues to light up and I won,t know anything else until the warmer weather allows them to play outside. I will play with them and let you know at a later date if I really love this item
customer_reviews.author: Taffy Notarcola

product_meta.title: Kan Jam Illuminate Ultra-Bright LED Light-Up Glow Soccer Ball, Size 5
product_meta.description: The Kan Jam ILLUMINATE LED Soccer Ball GLOWS Bright and will keep your game going for hours once the sun goes down. Play all night as the ILLUMINATE Soccer Ball is tough and rugged. Extend your Soccer Practice after dusk. Practice all your moves in the dark. The Soccer Ball Glows Bright while playing and shuts off automatically when not in use. OFFICIAL SIZE & WEIGHT The Kan Jam ILLUMINATE Soccer Ball will be the best 22.95 you've ever spent. ENJOY.
feature_bullets: Light Shuts Off Automatically When Not In Use
Best Glow Soccer Ball Value on the Market Batteries Included
KanJam is part of the Wild Sports Family of Brands. Check out our other great brands, Wild Sports and Proline Tailgating.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
